metadata.title: CVE-2023-52829 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: ath12k: fix possible out-of-bound write inath12k_wmi_ext_hal_reg_caps()reg_cap.phy_id is extracted from WMI event and could be an unexpected valuein case some errors happen. As a result out-of-bound write may occur tosoc->hal_reg_cap. Fix it by validating reg_cap.phy_id before using it.This is found during code review.Compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
